heading: Tom Dale Voted World's Coolest Person
text: On February 21st, 2018 Tom Dale was voted unanimously as the world's coolest person. This award came as no surprise to Tom as he already knew he was pretty dang cool. He is expected to move on from this award and continue doing really cool stuff.

heading: A Tree Actually Grew in Brooklyn
text: In shocking news, it was found that inside the New York City borough of Brooklyn a tree actually grew. An eye witness on the scene was reported as saying "Wow! I thought it was just a book, but there are actually trees growing here.".
